modName: Get Married In Skyrim In Style - Wedding Outfits
summary:
This is a complete replacement for the female wedding outfit. There are three different styles: Sister of Skyrim, Snow Queen and Daughter of Sithis. They can be installed individually, or you can use the standalone package. You can read more about them below.
*** Please note that these are high resolution textures.
descriptionHtml:
***NOW WITH STANDALONE PACKAGE***

This season we have three new dress styles for Skyrim\'s blushing brides to be.

Sister of Skyrim: This style celebrates the farming history of cities like Whiterun and other towns who work so very hard toiling the land. A choice that says: \'I am one with the soil of Skyrim, and this may be the only clean thing I\'ll ever own\'.

Snow Queen: For the girl who hails from our colder areas, perhaps Dawnstar or Windhelm, and who wants to celebrate her frozen heritage. The Snow Queen model is the definitive statement in northern pride and has additional fur lining for those extra long outdoors receptions back home.

Daughter of Sithis: New this season is our Daughter of Sithis model, which should be appealing to all necromancers, vampires and other daughter\'s of the night. It\'s tough finding the right person to settle down with, and whether it\'s a he, she or undead, we think this dress will exude your inner evil. 

HOW TO INSTALL THE INDIVIDUAL PACKAGES
Extract the archive to your Data folder (overwrite if prompted).

HOW TO INSTALL THE STANDALONE PACKAGE

1) Copy the contents of this archive to your Skyrim Data folder (overwrite if prompted).

2) Start Skyrim. In the launcher, click \"Data Files\" and select \"weddingdresses.esp\" (if it\'s not selected).

3) Launch Skyrim!

4) Find the dresses in Solitude at the only place you\'d find expensive clothing :)

HOW TO UNINSTALL
Remove the files contained in the archive.

CODES FOR THE INDIVIDUAL PACKAGES
00088956 - Dress
00088958 - Sandals
0008895A - Wreath

SHAMELESS PLUG
If you liked this, you may also like my female jester replacement:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3839
author: spiffy jim
